name: @darylkang/arbiter
description: Research-grade CLI for studying LLM behavior as a distribution.

scripts.gen:types: json2ts -i schemas/config.schema.json -o src/generated/config.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/manifest.schema.json -o src/generated/manifest.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/question.schema.json -o src/generated/question.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/trial.schema.json -o src/generated/trial.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/trial-plan.schema.json -o src/generated/trial-plan.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/parsed-output.schema.json -o src/generated/parsed-output.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/embedding.schema.json -o src/generated/embedding.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/embeddings-provenance.schema.json -o src/generated/embeddings-provenance.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/convergence-trace.schema.json -o src/generated/convergence-trace.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/aggregates.schema.json -o src/generated/aggregates.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/cluster-state.schema.json -o src/generated/cluster-state.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/cluster-assignment.schema.json -o src/generated/cluster-assignment.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/catalog.schema.json -o src/generated/catalog.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/prompt-manifest.schema.json -o src/generated/prompt-manifest.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/contract-manifest.schema.json -o src/generated/contract-manifest.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/decision-contract.schema.json -o src/generated/decision-contract.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/protocol.schema.json -o src/generated/protocol.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */" && json2ts -i schemas/debate-decision-contract.schema.json -o src/generated/debate-decision-contract.types.ts --bannerComment "/* This file is generated. Do not edit. */"
scripts.check:types: npm run gen:types && git diff --exit-code src/generated
scripts.test:mock-run: npm run build && node scripts/embed-text.mjs && node scripts/mock-run-smoke.mjs && node scripts/status-mapping.mjs && node scripts/receipt-failure.mjs && node scripts/zero-eligible.mjs && node scripts/error-code-null.mjs && node scripts/relative-config-path.mjs
scripts.test:clustering: npm run build && node scripts/clustering-determinism.mjs && node scripts/clustering-limit.mjs && node scripts/mock-run-interrupt.mjs
scripts.test:debate: npm run build && node scripts/mock-run-debate.mjs && node scripts/debate-empty.mjs
scripts.test:contracts: npm run build && node scripts/contract-fallback.mjs && node scripts/contract-policy.mjs
scripts.test:ui: npm run build && node scripts/tui-intent.mjs && node scripts/tui-headless.mjs && node scripts/event-bus-safety.mjs && node scripts/signal-handlers.mjs && node scripts/tui-warning-sink.mjs && node scripts/tui-command-smoke.mjs
scripts.test:verify: npm run build && node scripts/verify-smoke.mjs && node scripts/resolve-only.mjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test:pack
